entry.title: A5 Boxed Handmade Valentines Bouquet Card 'Valentino'
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: Valentine's Day Cards
Price: 25.00

A stunning handmade Valentine’s Day card - a perfect pick to let that special person in your life know that you are meant to be together. It is presented in a specially designed gift box and can be personalised with your own words on the cover and inside, making it a truly special card. The design features a Valentine’s Day bouquet made from artificial flowers and ribbon roses, bunny tails, and faux greenery. This Valentine's card is beautifully presented in a luxury gift box with a black velveteen frame inside for maximum presentation.

entry.title: A5 Boxed Handmade Valentine Card 'Sweet Valentine'
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: Valentine's Day Cards
Price: 22.85

This lovely and sweet handmade Valentines card is just perfect to wish a special person in your life a Happy Valentine’s Day. The design features paper shape of ice cream cone with flower arrangement made from faux flowers, ribbon roses, pom poms and fabric padded hearts. The card can be personalised with your personal message on front and inside. Each card comes in an individual luxury gift box with a black velveteen frame inside.

entry.title: A4 Handmade Boxed Valentine Card 'Pink Charm Bouquet’
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: Valentine's Day Cards
Price: 44.50

The 'Pink Charm Bouquet' Valentine’s Day card features the round bouquet made from artificial flowers and ribbon roses. The whole arrangement itself is gorgeously adorned with pink padded hearts, crystals and velvet bow with clear heart-shaped pendant in the middle.

The card can be personalised with your personal message on front and inside. Each card comes in an individual luxury gift box with a black velveteen frame inside.

entry.title: A5 Luxury Boxed Handmade Card 'Romantic Heart'
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: Valentine's Day Cards
Price: 22.95

A lovely ‘Romantic Heart’ handmade card to send that special message of love to your loved ones on Valentine's Day, anniversary or just because. It can be personalised with own words on front and inside, making it suitable for various occasions. The card features a heart made from ribbon roses, pom poms and white gypsophila flowers. The whole arrangement itself is gorgeously adorned with crystals, pearls and white chiffon ribbon.

This card is beautifully presented in luxury gift box with a black velveteen frame inside for maximum presentation.

entry.title: A4 Luxury Boxed Valentine Card 'Fantasia'
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: Valentine's Day Cards
Price: 44.50

This dramatic, exotic and seriously striking romantic card is perfect way to show all your love and affection to that special person in your life. The main feature of the design is a fancy heart-shaped bouquet made from ribbon roses, peacock feathers and faux greenery. The arrangement is embellished with crystals and tied with large shimmering red bow.

This Valentines card can be personalised with your own word on the cover and inside. It comes in beautiful luxury gift box with a black velveteen frame inside for maximum presentation.

entry.title: A5 Boxed Handmade Greeting Card 'I Adore You'
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: Valentine's Day Cards
Price: 23.50

Striking and vibrant - this handmade card a great way to say ‘I Adore You’ to that special person in your live. The main feature of the design is a bouquet made from ribbon roses, dry grasses, artificial flowers and padded hearts. The whole arrangement is handcrafted with crystals, mini flowers and a lovely burgundy velvet ribbon bow.

This Valentines card is beautifully presented in luxury gift box with a black velveteen frame inside for maximum presentation.

entry.title: A4 Luxury Boxed Handmade Card ‘Just For You’
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: Valentine's Day Cards
Price: 42.95

Send all your love to that special person in your life with this stylish extra-large personalised handmade card. Nothing says love more than a classic bouquet of red roses combined with lovely white gypsophila flowers. The whole arrangement is gorgeously handcrafted with crystals, red padded hearts and large shimmering red bow.

The card is presented in our signature luxury gift box with a black velveteen frame inside. It can presonalised with you own message both on front and inside, making it a perfect card for a loved one on Valentine’s Day, for birthdays, anniversaries, weddings and engagements.

entry.title: A5 Boxed Handmade Valentines Card 'Key To My Heart'
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: Valentine's Day Cards
Price: 23.50

A great card to give to that special person in your life who owns the key to your heart. It can be customised with your own personals message both on front and inside. Perfect for Valentine's Day or just because. The card is beautifully presented in luxury gift box with a black velveteen frame inside and will make a memorable keepsake.

The main motif of the design is a flower arrangement made from paper and silk ribbon roses, ribbons, burgundy skeleton leaves, pom poms and crystals. Pink glitter heart with small decorative brass key in the middle of the arrangement completed the look of the card.

entry.title: A4 Boxed Handmade Valentines Card ‘Heart of Roses’
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: Valentine's Day Cards
Price: 43.50

This truly luxurious extra large Valentines card is just perfect to show all your love and affection to that special person in your life. Presented in our signature grey gift box, the card for sure will be adored and cherished by spouse, partner or lover. It can be personalised with you own words of front and inside making it suitable for numerous occasions – Valentine’s Day, birthday, anniversary or just because. The truly three-dimensional design features the heart made from red and pink ribbon roses, faux flowers and fuchsia padded hearts. The whole arrangement itself is gorgeously adorned with crystals and pink mini flowers. Large velvet burgundy bow with clear heart-shaped pendant in the middle complete this classy design.

This Valentines card is beautifully presented in luxury gift box with a black velveteen frame inside for maximum presentation.

entry.title: A5 Boxed Handmade Valentines Card ‘The Luxe Heart’
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: Valentine's Day Cards
Price: 24.50

‘The Luxe Heart’ card is perfect to show all your desire and affection for someone you love on Valentine's Day. Truly exclusive, it comes in specially designed gift box full of red silk rose petals inside for that extra special little bit touch of luxury.

This 3-dimensional design features the heart made from ribbon roses and pom poms with black and gold appliqué and red heart-shaped pendant in the middle. The whole arrangement itself is adorned with red crystals. Large shimmering red and gold ribbon bow adds dimension and completes this striking design.

entry.title: A5 Boxed Handmade Valentines Card 'Romance'
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: Valentine's Day Cards
Price: 23.95

A stunning handmade Valentine’s Day card - a perfect pick to let that special person in your life know that you are meant to be together. It is presented in specially designed gift box and can be personalised with your own words on the cover and inside, making it a truly special card.  The design features the flower arrangement made from a large burgundy silk vintage rose, glitter and padded hearts, ribbon roses, faux greenery, ribbons, skeleton leaves and crystals.

This Valentines card is beautifully presented in luxury gift box with a black velveteen frame inside for maximum presentation.

entry.title: A5 Boxed Handmade Card 'Affection'
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: Valentine's Day Cards
Price: 22.85

A truly gorgeous card for your soul mate and love of your love on Valentine's Day, Birthday or just because. It is just perfect for two people who are meant to be together. Presented in luxurious gift box, it will make a really memorable keepsake.

The design boasts a bouquet made from three large red ribbon roses, burgundy ribbons, faux greenery red and red bunny tails. The whole arrangement is mounted to the white square frame and handcrafted with crystals and small ribbon roses. The finishing touch is a large black ribbon bow with multicoloured crystals and red heart-shaped pendant.

This handmade card is beautifully presented in luxury gift box with a black velveteen frame inside for maximum presentation.

entry.title: A5 Boxed Handmade Photo Card 'Loving You'
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: Valentine's Day Cards
Price: 21.85

A special card for a special person in your life - a great keepsake gift to give to the love of your life on Valentine's Day, Birthday or Ruby 30th Anniversary. Fully customisable with you own message - it is perfect for your girlfriend or boyfriend, wife or husband, lover or just best friend. The design will be personalised with your favourite photograph mounted to the purple paper frame in the middle of the design. The whole arrangement is gorgeously adorned with crystals, metallic and wooden hearts, roses, pom poms, wooden 'love' letters and burgundy satin bow.

This handmade photo card is beautifully presented in luxury gift box with a black velveteen frame inside for maximum presentation.

entry.title: A5 Boxed Handmade Valentines Card 'Hearts and Bows'
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: Valentine's Day Cards
Price: 24.50

Glamorous and sparkling - this card is great way for expressing your love and affection for your girlfriend, wife or lover on Valentine's Day or any other day of the year. It comes in our specially designed luxury gift box and can be customised with your personal message.

The design features burgundy and pink valentines bouquet made from glitter hearts, satin ribbons, skeleton leaves and bunny tales. The whole arrangement is nicely framed in the middle of the card. Pink and burgundy sparkling ribbon bow with red heart-shaped pendant in the middle complete this fashionable design.

entry.title: A5 Boxed Handmade Valentines Card 'Sweetheart'
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: Valentine's Day Cards
Price: 21.95

This truly stylish and classy individually boxed Valentine's card will be the perfect choice to impress your sweetheart on this Valentine’s Day. The card comes in a gift box full of pink rose petals for that extra special touch of luxury. The design features printed heart of roses gorgeously hand-crafted with ribbon roses, crystals and satin bow.

This Valentines card is beautifully presented in luxury gift box with a black velveteen frame inside for maximum presentation.
